data.title: California’s Cannabis Track-and-Trace (CCTT) System Update
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: Do you want the latest information on California’s Cannabis Track-and-Trace (CCTT) system? Do you want help preparing required documentation for transfers of cannabis and cannabis products between temporary licensees? If so, visit the CalCannabis website or click on the links provided below. California’s Cannabis Track-and-Trace (CCTT) System â€“ Frequently Asked Questions.
